title: 106: Spring Scouting Report
itunes:title: 106: Spring Scouting Report
description:
Former NFL Scouts Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks debate what rookies will have the most successful first year by position. The guys also take you inside a NFL scouts schedule in the spring and summer months preparing for the next season and draft. DJ and Bucky then wrap the show by breaking down a couple of 2017 prospects including Clemson quarterback Deshaun Watson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
